name: Free the Animation
description: Free the Animation - WebGL Animation and Game - Animation with the Roller Coaster - Shooting Game with the Roller Coaster
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 64 bits Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GPU / WebGL Support Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Not Mandatory Additional Notes: 3D Positional Audio Support
